title: David Byrne, Brian Eno Everything That Happens Will Happen Today
description:
Released: August 4, 2008

Everything That Happens Will Happen Today is the second album made in collaboration between David Byrne and Brian Eno,[1] released on August 18, 2008.[2] It is the first collaboration between the two since 1981's My Life in the Bush of Ghosts and Eno's work producing and co-writing with Talking Heads. Byrne and Eno worked on creating the album - a mix of electronic and Gospel music - throughout 2007 and early 2008 over e-mail and have used word-of-mouth and Internet sales to market the music. Byrne will tour for this album, performing songs from both this release and from the duo's previous collaborations, through late 2008 and early 2009.

The complete album, in pristine FLAC.
